altername_name: Mi Experto en Frances: Mejora tu Vocabulario Frances
My French Coach: Level 1: Learn to Speak French
My French Coach: Learn a New Language
name: My French Coach
overview: Playing My French Coach for 15 to 20 minutes a day is all you need to become fluent in French. This title teaches the basics of word, use, grammar and construction of phrases through minigames and evaluates your progress. There are 1000 interactive lessons designed with French teachers, 10,000 words and 400 phrases, including pronunciation tests using the built-in DS microphone.
